1.content:
Here are the FIVE different leagues of the F.U.R.R.Y Wrestling Federation! Here you will take your pick, and in the next chapter you'll choose your fighter!

Division 1: Foulplay: In this division fighters are all about humiliation and shaming their foe. They're nasty, smelly, rude, crude and utterly awful. They'll stop at nothing to completely disgust and torture their foe. Matches in this division are surrender only. If a competitor passes out they are revived and the fight continues until they surrender.
Champion: The Stink Duchess Noxia Putrastench
Returning Fighters: Bella Bottoms and Rude Duke


Division 2: Underbelly: Fighters in this division are all about satisfying their cravings for furries. Eating your foe after your victory is not only encouraged, but required. Devouring can be done from any end with any hole, and there is no returning once you're swallowed up by your enemy. Excreting them is allowed, but optional
Champion: The Voracious Naga Aurora
Returning fighters: Madame Molly Moo and "The Belchin' Boar" Brock

Division 3: Rumble: Your standard, average, run of the mill wrestling ring. Drama, tension and of course pure rage run through the veins of these furries, who are only here for a fight. Fetish material can of course be included, but should take backseat to the brawls. Excessive force is a bonus! Mutilation Ho!
Champion: Thundering Lizard King Amadeus
Returning fighters: Helen Hellbent and Stink-Eye Morty

Division 4:Rival: In the vein of popular fighting interactive "You Vs Who", the Rival division allows you to create your own character and fight an opponent. Rules are the same as your normal fights, with the exception that you need to keep the fights fair. Discuss the brawl with your opponent beforehand. I know wrestling isn't fake (perish the thought!) but it always helps to have a "plan" of sorts.
Champion: The Big Bad Bodacious Bitch: Beatdown Braun!

Division 5:Yiff: A fighting circuit for Furs who want to make love, not war. Furries will engage in sexual combat, the loser is the one who willingly submits to their foe, passes out or is unable to continue their sexings. Fetishes can be of course included, but make sure your foe enjoys them as well, or you'll be working AGAINST your cause. Mild violence can occur, but your only allowed targets are the opponent's sexparts!
Champion: The Queen of Heat: The Huntress!
Returning Fighters: Diana Drillbit and The Stud With No Name

Select your division to get More Info!:

info.description:
Welcome to MY tribute to Furry Wrestling and its Sequel. In here we will be sponsoring fights under the five divisions of F.U.R.R.Y, competitors will relax in the Five Star "King's Kennel" hotel between their battles. Battles which are fought to rise up the rankings to challenge their division champs

Each of the Five Divisions, outlined inside, will have a selection of "Returning Fighters" to choose from, as well as slots for your personal character creation. The only section that does NOT have "Returning Fighters" is the "Rival" division (Once again discussed in the first chapter).

In between fights you can feel free to relax with your character, tell a side story or get into some dirty deeds at the Hotel. Which brings me to my next point ANYTHING GOES. Any sort of nasty thing you can feel like getting down to is A-OK. Any Age too! Hell if I care, it's words on the internet baby. Can't hurt nobody. If it gets you off it's fiiiine with me. And let's be honest here, SOMEONE out there is getting off to this.

Alright, to wrap up HERE ARE THE RULES FOR ADDING:

General: Make sure that your chapters are of a fair size. If you're fighting another writer, try to make it an interesting and mutually satisfying fight. Obey at the very least the bear minimums of English convention when writing.

Champions: The Champs of the divisions will be stated at the beginning. In order to fight them, you have to fight at least THREE matches and win. Now that shouldn't be TOO hard considering anyone fighting in any of the divisions aside from "Rival" will be deciding their own opponents and completely deciding their matches/career. They're the top of the league and will ALWAYS be a long, hard fight.

Finally and most importantly: See this whole first page? All the rules and stuff? That's ABOUT how long your entries should be. At the very least HALF as long. I don't care if you do an entire match in one chapter(I don't recommend it, because stretching it out is more fun), but it's gotta be at least HALF as long as this description. Clear? Awesome. I'm gonna go get the first few chapters started.
